title: Privacy Policy
text:
I. General Provisions

1.1. The controller of personal data under Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council ("GDPR") is Three Whales s.r.o., identification number (IČO): 19925468, registered address: Lidická 700/19, Veveří, 602 00 Brno, Czech Republic (hereinafter referred to as the "Controller").

1.2. Contact details of the Controller:

  • Registered address: Lidická 700/19, Veveří, 602 00 Brno.
  • Email: help@capycanna.com.

1.3. Personal data refers to any information related to an identified or identifiable individual. An identifiable individual is a person who can be directly or indirectly identified, for example, by name, identification number, location data, or other characteristics.

1.4. The Controller has not appointed a data protection officer.

II. Sources and Categories of Processed Personal Data

2.1. The personal data processed by the Controller are provided by you when placing an order, creating an account, or interacting with the online store.

2.2. The Controller processes the following categories of data:

  • Identification data: name, surname.
  • Contact data: address, email, phone number.
  • Payment information and data necessary to fulfill the contract.

III. Legal Grounds and Purposes for Data Processing

3.1. Legal grounds for data processing:

  • Performance of a contract between you and the Controller in accordance with Article 6(1)(b) GDPR.
  • The Controller's legitimate interests in direct marketing (e.g., sending commercial offers) under Article 6(1)(f) GDPR.
  • Your consent to process data for marketing purposes if no goods or services were ordered, under Article 6(1)(a) GDPR and Act No. 480/2004 Coll.

3.2. Purposes of data processing:

  • Fulfilling obligations related to your order.
  • Communicating with customers and managing orders.
  • Sending marketing messages and newsletters.

3.3. You may opt-out of receiving marketing communications at any time by emailing help@capycanna.com or clicking the unsubscribe link in the communication.

3.4. The Controller does not make automated decisions, including profiling, that may affect your rights.

IV. Data Retention Periods

4.1. Personal data are stored:

  • For the duration of contractual obligations and 15 years after their completion.
  • Until consent for data processing for marketing purposes is withdrawn, but no longer than 10 years.

4.2. After the specified retention periods expire, data are deleted or anonymized.

V. Recipients of Personal Data

5.1. Personal data may be shared with the following parties:

  • Courier services for product delivery.
  • Payment systems for processing payments.
  • Service providers involved in website maintenance and marketing activities.

5.2. The Controller does not transfer personal data outside the European Union.

VI. Your Rights

6.1. Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

  • Access your personal data (Article 15 GDPR).
  • Rectify your data (Article 16 GDPR) or restrict its processing (Article 18 GDPR).
  • Erase your data (Article 17 GDPR).
  • Object to processing (Article 21 GDPR).
  • Data portability (Article 20 GDPR).
  • Withdraw your consent to processing at any time by contacting the Controller.

6.2. You may also file a complaint with the Czech Data Protection Authority if you believe your rights have been violated.

VII. Data Security Policy

7.1. The Controller takes technical and organizational measures to safeguard personal data.

7.2. Access to data is restricted to authorized personnel who are bound by confidentiality.

7.3. Data storage systems are protected by technical means to prevent information leaks.

VIII. Cookies

8.1. This website uses cookies for the following purposes:

  • Ensuring the proper functioning of the website.
  • Analyzing user behavior.
  • Personalizing advertisements.

8.2. For more information about cookies, see the Cookie Policy.

IX. Final Provisions

9.1. By placing an order or registering on the website, you confirm that you have read and agree to this Privacy Policy.

9.2. The Controller reserves the right to modify this policy. The updated version will be published on the website and may also be sent to the client’s email.

9.3. This Privacy Policy is effective from 01.01.2025.
